name: Inkling
senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 11
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

actions.name: Lash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Amorphous
special_abilities.desc: The inkling can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

special_abilities.name: A Thirst for Knowledge
special_abilities.desc: If an inkling spends 24 hours with a spellbook or a spell scroll, it can learn the magic of one 2nd level or lower spell, erasing and absorbing all the ink and magic used to inscribe the spell. The inkling can then cast the spell once per day.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The inkling has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The inkling's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring only somatic components:
At will: fire bolt, mending, minor illusion, prestidigitation
1/day each: color spray, detect magic, magic missile
